segments.source_content:
---
id: multi-instance
description: Use multiple docs plugin instances on a single Docusaurus site.
slug: /docs-multi-instance
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Docs Multi-instance

translations.zh-hant: # 多實例文檔

segments.source_content: The `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs` plugin can support [multi-instance](../../using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids).

translations.zh-hant: `@docusaurus/plugin-content-docs` 插件支援[多實例](../../using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids)功能。

segments.source_content:
:::note

This feature is only useful for [versioned documentation](./versioning.mdx). It is recommended to be familiar with docs versioning before reading this page. If you just want [multiple sidebars](./sidebar/multiple-sidebars.mdx), you can do so within one plugin.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

此功能僅適用於[版本化文檔](./versioning.mdx)。建議在閱讀本頁前先熟悉文檔版本化功能。若您僅需要[多側邊欄](./sidebar/multiple-sidebars.mdx)，可在單一插件內實現。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Use-cases {#use-cases}

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用場景 {#use-cases}

segments.source_content: Sometimes you want a Docusaurus site to host 2 distinct sets of documentation (or more).

translations.zh-hant: 有時您會希望一個 Docusaurus 站點能托管兩套（或更多）獨立的文檔集。

segments.source_content: These documentations may even have different versioning/release lifecycles.

translations.zh-hant: 這些文檔集可能還具有不同的版本化/發布週期。

segments.source_content: ### Mobile SDKs documentation {#mobile-sdks-documentation}

translations.zh-hant: ### 移動端 SDK 文檔 {#mobile-sdks-documentation}

segments.source_content: If you build a cross-platform mobile SDK, you may have 2 documentations:

translations.zh-hant: 若您開發跨平台移動端 SDK，可能會擁有兩套文檔：

segments.source_content:
- Android SDK documentation (`v1.0`, `v1.1`)
- iOS SDK documentation (`v1.0`, `v2.0`)

translations.zh-hant:
- Android SDK 文檔（`v1.0`、`v1.1`）
- iOS SDK 文檔（`v1.0`、`v2.0`）

segments.source_content: In this case, you can use a distinct docs plugin instance per mobile SDK documentation.

translations.zh-hant: 此情況下，可為每個移動端 SDK 文檔使用獨立的插件實例。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

If each documentation instance is very large, you should rather create 2 distinct Docusaurus sites.

If someone edits the iOS documentation, is it really useful to rebuild everything, including the whole Android documentation that did not change?

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

若每個文檔實例體量龐大，建議創建兩個獨立的 Docusaurus 站點。

當有人編輯 iOS 文檔時，重建所有內容（包括未變更的整個 Android 文檔）真的有必要嗎？

:::

segments.source_content: ### Versioned and unversioned doc {#versioned-and-unversioned-doc}

translations.zh-hant: ### 版本化與非版本化文檔 {#versioned-and-unversioned-doc}

segments.source_content: Sometimes, you want some documents to be versioned, while other documents are more "global", and it feels useless to version them.

translations.zh-hant: 有時您會希望部分文檔進行版本控制，而其他「全局性」文檔則無需版本化。

segments.source_content: We use this pattern on the Docusaurus website itself:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 官方網站即採用此模式：

segments.source_content:
- The [/docs/\*](/docs) section is versioned
- The [/community/\*](/community/support) section is unversioned

translations.zh-hant:
- [/docs/\*](/docs) 目錄下的文檔進行版本控制
- [/community/\*](/community/support) 目錄下的社群文檔不進行版本控制

segments.source_content: ## Setup {#setup}

translations.zh-hant: ## 配置方式 {#setup}

segments.source_content: Suppose you have 2 documentations:

translations.zh-hant: 假設您有兩套文檔：

segments.source_content:
- Product: some versioned doc about your product
- Community: some unversioned doc about the community around your product

translations.zh-hant:
- 產品文檔：關於產品的版本化文檔
- 社群文檔：關於產品周邊社群的未版本化文檔

segments.source_content: In this case, you should use the same plugin twice in your site configuration.

translations.zh-hant: 此情況下，您應在站點配置中重複使用該插件兩次。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

`@docusaurus/preset-classic` already includes a docs plugin instance for you!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

`@docusaurus/preset-classic` 已預設包含一個文檔插件實例！

:::

segments.source_content: When using the preset:

translations.zh-hant: 使用預設配置時：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5d4925eb

segments.source_content: When not using the preset:

translations.zh-hant: 不使用預設配置時：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cae897fb

segments.source_content: Don't forget to assign a unique `id` attribute to plugin instances.

translations.zh-hant: 請勿忘記為插件實例分配唯一的 `id` 屬性。

segments.source_content:
:::note

We consider that the `product` instance is the most important one, and make it the "default" instance by not assigning any ID.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

我們將 `product` 實例視為最重要的實例，通過不分配 ID 使其成為「預設」實例。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Versioned paths {#versioned-paths}

translations.zh-hant: ## 版本化路徑 {#versioned-paths}

segments.source_content: Each plugin instance will store versioned docs in a distinct folder.

translations.zh-hant: 每個插件實例會將版本化文檔存儲在獨立目錄中。

segments.source_content: The default plugin instance will use these paths:

translations.zh-hant: 預設插件實例使用以下路徑：

segments.source_content:
- `website/versions.json`
- `website/versioned_docs`
- `website/versioned_sidebars`

translations.zh-hant:
- `website/versions.json`
- `website/versioned_docs`
- `website/versioned_sidebars`

segments.source_content: The other plugin instances (with an `id` attribute) will use these paths:

translations.zh-hant: 其他插件實例（帶有 `id` 屬性）使用以下路徑：

segments.source_content:
- `website/[pluginId]_versions.json`
- `website/[pluginId]_versioned_docs`
- `website/[pluginId]_versioned_sidebars`

translations.zh-hant:
- `website/[pluginId]_versions.json`
- `website/[pluginId]_versioned_docs`
- `website/[pluginId]_versioned_sidebars`

segments.source_content:
:::tip

You can omit the `id` attribute (defaults to `default`) for one of the docs plugin instances.

The instance paths will be simpler, and retro-compatible with a single-instance setup.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

您可為其中一個文檔插件實例省略 `id` 屬性（默認為 `default`）。

該實例路徑將更簡潔，並保持與單實例配置的向後兼容性。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Tagging new versions {#tagging-new-versions}

translations.zh-hant: ## 標記新版本 {#tagging-new-versions}

segments.source_content: Each plugin instance will have its own CLI command to tag a new version. They will be displayed if you run:

translations.zh-hant: 每個插件實例都有專用的 CLI 命令來標記新版本。運行以下命令即可查看：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run docusaurus -- --help
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_dddc2d3c

segments.source_content: To version the product/default docs plugin instance:

translations.zh-hant: 要為產品/預設文件插件實例進行版本控制：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run docusaurus docs:version 1.0.0
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5010ec34

segments.source_content: To version the non-default/community docs plugin instance:

translations.zh-hant: 要為非預設/社群文件插件實例進行版本控制：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm run docusaurus docs:version:community 1.0.0
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ebc385af

segments.source_content: ## Docs navbar items {#docs-navbar-items}

translations.zh-hant: ## 文件導航欄項目 {#docs-navbar-items}

segments.source_content: Each docs-related [theme navbar items](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar) take an optional `docsPluginId` attribute.

translations.zh-hant: 每個與文件相關的[主題導航欄項目](../../api/themes/theme-configuration.mdx#navbar)都可選用 `docsPluginId` 屬性。

segments.source_content: For example, if you want to have one version dropdown for each mobile SDK (iOS and Android), you could do:

translations.zh-hant: 舉例來說，若您想為每個行動 SDK（iOS 和 Android）設置獨立的版本下拉選單，可以這樣設定：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_0152e600
